<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_transform_map"><sys_transform_map action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><copy_empty_fields>false</copy_empty_fields><create_new_record_on_empty_coalesce_fields>false</create_new_record_on_empty_coalesce_fields><enforce_mandatory_fields>No</enforce_mandatory_fields><name>Import Historic NeedIt Data2</name><order>100</order><run_business_rules>false</run_business_rules><run_script>true</run_script><script><![CDATA[(function transformRow(source, target, map, log, isUpdate) {

    if (!("u_requested_for_email" in source)) {
        var name = source.u_requested_for.toLowerCase();
        target.u_requested_for_email = name.replace(" ", ".") + "@example.com";
    }
// 	 if (!("u_when_needed" in source)) {
        
//         target.u_when_needed = "12/02/20";
//     }

})(source, target, map, log, action === "update");]]></script><source_table>x_647573_innovate_historic_needit_data</source_table><sys_class_name>sys_transform_map</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-06-06 00:46:07</sys_created_on><sys_id>e4f9f7f11ba070109bbcebd5624bcb4e</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Import Historic NeedIt Data2</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Innovate" source="x_647573_innovate">64ce14c907a03010b314f2ae7c1ed092</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Innovate">64ce14c907a03010b314f2ae7c1ed092</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_transform_map_e4f9f7f11ba070109bbcebd5624bcb4e</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-06-06 01:07:04</sys_updated_on><target_table>x_647573_innovate_needit</target_table></sys_transform_map></record_update>
